entry.title: Gemini exchange is fully back online...
entry.summary: Gemini exchange is fully back online... Gemini: Gemini exchange fully back online; all customer funds held on the Gemini exchange are held 1:1 and available for withdrawal at any time.

entry.title: Re UPDATE: Gemini Exchange went down due to an Amazon Web Service outage. They are working to bring the exchange back up...
entry.summary: Re UPDATE: Gemini Exchange went down due to an Amazon Web Service outage. They are working to bring the exchange back up... Gemini: We experienced an Amazon Web Services EBS outage with one of our primary databases. We have restored the database and are bringing the exchange back up.
